detectors.description:
GOFGYCRVPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GOFGYCRVPool.sol#701-729) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(periodFinish.sub(block.timestamp)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GOFGYCRVPool.sol#710)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GOFGYCRVPool.sol#713)
detectors.markdown:
[GOFGYCRVPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GOFGYCRVPool.sol#L701-L729) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(periodFinish.sub(block.timestamp))](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GOFGYCRVPool.sol#L710)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GOFGYCRVPool.sol#L713)
